name: Estranged: Act II
description:
Estranged: Act II follows the story of a fisherman, stranded on a mysterious island during a violent storm.
The game continues after the events of Estranged: Act I, which followed our hero's adventure in a search for a way to get home.
Experience what the island has in store as you uncover the secretive Arque Corporation, burrowing ever deeper into their dangerous and hazard operations.
